about.title: About artUP
about.exhibition_text:
artUP is a contemporary art exhibition bringing together 18 international artists across diverse mediums and practices. From street art to classical painting, digital art to installations â€“ artUP celebrates the diversity and vitality of contemporary artistic expression.

Held in the heart of Speyer, this month-long exhibition creates a platform for emerging and established artists to showcase their work and engage with the community.
